data.name: BERlin Tuesday
data.short_description: Every Tuesday we invite you to Germany's newest airport! Encounter experienced controllers motivated and ready to get you down safely into our capital.
data.description:
We invite you every Tuesday to our weekly Online-Day. From 18:30-21:30z you can enjoy our professional ATC services at the capital city airport Berlin Brandenburg. Expect perfectly managed transitions, crowded aprons and lots of movement on the parallel runways. No matter whether you want to fly IFR or VFR, there will be always some room for your favourite aircraft in our modern designed airspace. Don't hesitate, start your sim and give us a visit, we can't wait to see you! In case you forgot to carry the EFB with you or you aren't really familiar with our procedures, we got you covered:

You can find charts at: https://chartfox.org/EDDB Check out our briefing at: http://vats.im/eddb

data.name: Zurich Night
data.short_description: Welcome to the Zurich Night, the weekly online-day of Switzerland's major airport! Every Tuesday from 19:00z to 21:00z, expect full staffing, professional and friendly ATC service and plenty of traffic.
data.description:
Welcome to the Zurich Night, the weekly online-day of Switzerland's major airport! **Every Tuesday from 19:00z to 21:00z**, expect full staffing, professional and friendly ATC service and plenty of traffic.

Enjoy one of total 4 IFR approaches or get yourself a spot as a small VFR aircraft between the big birds. VFR flights are still performed regularly despite the airport's size. This makes flying VFR to/from Zurich extremely interesting, but it's also a huge challenge which requires careful preparation. A lot of small airfields in the vicinity offer numerous possibilities for short VFR hops.

Zurich is a unique airport with a lot of operational restrictions due to noise abatement and its challenging layout. We know it by heart and love this airport with all its rough edges. And we are sure you gonna love it as well!

Almost every Tuesday we will also staff Geneva (LSGG) and Basel (LFSB) for you with our Trainees. Check out the bookings on vacc.ch.

Join our frequencies every Tuesday evening and enjoy!

data.name: VACC-Austria Weekly Wednesday
data.short_description: Weekly Wednesday - every Wednesday - 1830-2130z - FULL ATC in Austria
data.description:
Enjoy extended coverage of FULL ATC across the entire country. Take your favourite aircraft out of the hanger for a spin to our majors Vienna (LOWW) and/or the infamous Innsbruck Airport (LOWI). Alternatively enjoy a flight to our breath-taking minors: Salzburg (LOWS), Graz (LOWG), Klagenfurt (LOWK) or Linz (LOWL). Of course, we are providing full CPDLC and PDC service along the way!

Take a break from your busy schedule and enjoy an evening with 3 hours of guaranteed ATC-service "as real as it gets"! We are very excited to welcome you to one of our airports!

data.name: Milano nights
data.short_description: Dear pilots, VATITA is welcoming you all to fly in the Milan FIR, where we'll offer just the best of services, from the top to the bottom, covering the airports of Malpensa (LIMC), Bergamo (LIME) and Linate (LIML). We'll see you there! -The Vatita staff.
data.description:
Dear pilots,**VATITA is welcoming you all** to fly in the Milan FIR, where we'll offer just the best of services, from  top to bottom, covering the airports of Malpensa (LIMC), Bergamo (LIME) and Linate (LIML).

Pick your favorite plane, and fly in and out of our beautiful country, maybe connecting with our dear neighbors!

There's something for everyone, so contact Milano on 127.450!

[LIMC pilot briefing, charts and sceneries](https://vats.im/it/LIMCBrief)

data.name: 12 Days of Adria - Day 1 | LYPG & LYTV
data.short_description: VATAdria presents to you: 12 Days of Adria - Day 1 | Podgorica & Tivat
data.description:
The festive season is approaching and the events team have spent months planning on how we can make this Christmas a special one for Adria. The result is the most exciting event series Adria has seen to date: 12 Days of Adria. This Christmas, for the 11 days leading up to the 25th of December, Adria will open a different airport each day, culminating in our longest event of the series, with an airport that you don't want to miss which will be open for at least 6 hours on Christmas Day, giving you plenty of options to fly if you're stumped with what to do if you don't celebrate Christmas on the 25th, or if your celebrations are over and perhaps you have some new peripherals to try!

With this announcement, we are happy to announce that the first 2 airports we are opening are:

Podgorica (LYPG) and Tivat (LYTV)

We will be opening these airports from the hours of 17z-20z on the 14th of December. We hope that you will be able to join us at some point between the 14th and 25th of December to help make this event series, the biggest Adria has ever seen! We hope to see you there!

data.name: Welcome to HEL
data.short_description: VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki Airport will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.
data.description:
VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.

A rapidly growing team of controllers is looking forward to guiding you into Helsinki Airport (EFHK). Helsinki Control (EFIN_CTR) will also provide top-down service all across Finnish airspace. We guarantee professional, flexible and friendly service across the entirety of Finland.

See you on Thursday!

[Briefing](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/pilots/airports-charts/airport/efhk/) and [Charts](https://www.ais.fi/aip/ad/efhk/efhk.htm)

data.name: RegionNL Eindhoven
data.short_description: The Dutch VACC invites you to our RegionNL online day where we fully staff one of our local gems. This time Eindhoven Airport (EHEH | EIN), the second largest airport in the Netherlands, is in the spotlights on the 14th of December between 1830 and 2030z.
data.description:
The Dutch VACC invites you to our **RegionNL online day** where we fully staff one of our local gems. This time **Eindhoven Airport** (EHEH | EIN), the second largest airport in the Netherlands, is in the spotlights on the **14th of December** between **1830 and 2030z.**

The airport is used by both civilian and military traffic. So come on over in your favourite airliner, small GA airplane, A330-MRTT or bizz jet – it’s daily routine here!

Charts can be found [here](https://www.dutchvacc.nl/charts/) or [here](https://eaip.lvnl.nl/web/2023-10-19-AIRAC/html/eAIP/EH-AD-2.EHEH-en-GB.html#eheh-ad-2.24) | (both IFR and VFR)

Scenery: [MSFS](https://nl.flightsim.to/file/785/eindhoven-airport-eheh-incl-custom-buildings) | [P3D v4/v5](https://www.nl-2000.com/2018/12/nl2000-version-5-0-download-instructions-and-locations/) | [FSX/P3D v3-](https://www.nl-2000.com/2010/05/nl2000-version-40-download-instructions-and-locations/)

Hope to talk to you on the radio!

data.name: Transversal Thursday : Fly The Mistral Edition
data.short_description: Little over a year ago the French vACC and vACC Switzerland introduced a new edition of Transversal Thursday "Fly the Mistral“ connecting Marseille and Geneva and was one of the most popular editions. We are proud to announce that we are bringing this iconic event back!
data.description: Little over a year ago the French vACC and vACC Switzerland introduced a new edition of Transversal Thursday. „Fly the Mistral“ connected Marseille and Geneva and was one of the more popular editions last year. We are proud to announce that we are bringing this iconic event back! Join us and fly the short 180nm hop between Geneva (LSGG) and Marseille (LFML) on December 14th from 19:00z to 21:00z. Challenge yourself and face possible icing conditions in Geneva or tempestous weather in Marseille. Do you have what it takes? We will see you out there!

data.name: [EPKK_APP] | S3 Exam
data.short_description: 14DEC2023 19-21z S3 Controller examination EPKK_APP covering EPKK and EPKT. All traffic welcome!
data.description: Are you ready for quick run with candidate for S3 rating in Poland? Jan is awaiting you on EPKK_APP. It does not matter which type of aircraft you fly or on which flight rules! IFR, VFR, NVFR flights are welcome! Start of the exam on 14DEC 19z on Krakow Approach covering EPKK and EPKT international airports.

data.name: Acropolis Nights
data.short_description: Join us every Friday for a breathtaking experience over the iconic city of Athens. Acropolis Nights, hosted by Hellenic vACC, is your weekly opportunity to immerse yourself in the magic of aviation and explore Athens like never before! See you there!
data.description: Join us every Friday for a breathtaking experience over the iconic city of Athens. Acropolis Nights, hosted by Hellenic vACC, is your weekly opportunity to immerse yourself in the magic of aviation and explore Athens like never before. Our experienced controllers will make sure to provide you with full ATC coverage over Athens International Airport ''Eleftherios Venizelos" whilst you enjoy the spectacular views over the Acropolis. So what are you waiting for? Mark your calendars and we will see you in our virtual skies!

data.name: Transylvanian Connection - Bucharest to Cluj
data.short_description: Join us today and enjoy control both in Bucharest (LROP) the beautiful capital of Romania and in the hearth of Transylvania in Cluj Napoca city (LRCL). Starting sharp at 18z join us and be ready for professional ATC.
data.description:
On the third Friday of December, vACC Romania would like to invite pilots to fly between the capital city of Romania - Bucharest LROP and the hearth of Transylvania - Cluj Napoca LRCL.

On 15th of December, starting with 18z, join us for three hours and enjoy full ATC at the both airports, LROP and LRCL and on the way above the Carpathian Mountains.

See you there!

We recommend to have installed one of the approved sceneries: X-Plane default scenery or one in the list for LRCL Airport: [LRCL Sceneries](https://rovacc.ro/romanian-sceneries/#CLJ)

**Pay attention! MSFS pilots have to install [this](https://flightsim.to/file/56414/lrcl-aeroportul-international-avram-iancu-cluj) scenery!**

data.name: [LROP_TWR] | S2 Exam
data.short_description: We need your help! Fly IFR or VFR to or from Bucharest Otopeni Airport (LROP) and help Mihnea to get his full job in Tower.
data.description: Join us Friday, December 15th, as VFR or IFR, bring your favorite aircraft, and be prepared to test our students on the position of Otopeni Tower. You can perform touch and goes or fly in our beautiful airspace during *Transylvanian Connection - Bucharest to Cluj*! See you there, and let's wish Mihnea good luck!

data.name: X-Mas Fly-in Hungary 2023
data.short_description: We would like to invite everyone to join us on 16 December (Saturday) for our annual X-Mas Fly-in event!
data.description:
Enjoy the full ATC Coverage in the Hungarian airspace throughout the day from 09z until 17z as we are working in long shifts to deliver you an awesome Christmas event this December.
We would be more than happy to see you on our scopes, so make sure you hop over to LHBP - Budapest, LHDC - Debrecen or LHSM - Hévíz-Balaton on that Saturday.

Charts: https://vacchun.hu/en/terkepek-es-scenery/

data.name: Berlin Overload
data.short_description: On 16.12.2023 from 1600z to 2200z, there's an event at Berlin Brandenburg Capital Airport (EDDB) with full ATC coverage throughout. Controllers welcome both airliners and sports aircraft. Mark the day in your calendar, and tune in to one of the frequencies to participate!
data.description:
Berlin, Berlin, we are flying to Berlin.

On 16.12.2023 from 1600z to 2200z another event will take place at the capital airport Berlin Brandenburg (EDDB). Over the entire event period, this airport will be manned with complete ATC coverage to ensure a very nice service.
Whether with an airliner or a sports aircraft, the controllers are looking forward to seeing you. So mark the day in bold and in colour in your calendar and we will hear each other on one of the frequencies.

data.name: Levante Fully Staffed
data.short_description: On 16th December 2023 from 1700z to 2000z, VATSIM Spain invites you to fly with us in the beautiful region of Levante [LEAL, LEVC, LECH, LEMI], an area on the Mediterranean coast where you can enjoy beautiful views of the coast and its famous landscapes!
data.description:
While most of Europe is struggling with cold and snow, why not come to Spain and enjoy the winter in a Spanish way? 

***On 16th December 2023 from 1700z to 2000z***, VATSIM Spain invites you to fly to or from **Levante**, an area on the Mediterranean coast where you can enjoy beautiful views of the coast and its famous landscapes! 

High quality ATC will be waiting for you, as the whole region will be fully staffed **[LEAL, LEVC, LECH, LEMI]** and ready to help you have an amazing experience. 

You might even find yourself flying into some local airports that you have never visited before! Hope to see you there!

* Charts: [Spanish AIP](https://aip.enaire.es/AIP/) or [CharFox](https://chartfox.org/)

data.name: Kennedy & Swiss Dreams
data.short_description: Fire up those long-distance aircraft as you set out on a transatlantic flight! The New York ARTCC is teaming up with vACC Switzerland as pilots fly one-way from Zurich (LSZH) to New York-Kennedy (KJFK).
data.description:
‘Tis the season! Christmas is at the door and people are rushing to get one of the last seats on flights from Zurich to New York. Whether returning home from boarding school in Interlaken or just trying to get some Christmas shopping done in the Big Apple, we have got you covered. vACC Switzerland and the New York ARTCC are proud to present an enticing new event: Kennedy & Swiss Dreams!

This will be our last event of 2023, so get some hot cocoa and tell maintenance to ready your favorite long haul aircraft for one last adventure this year. Join us on December 17th for a cozy transatlantic day trip form Zurich to New York-Kennedy.

Departures are expected to leave Zurich between 7am-9am Eastern (1200z-1400z) and arrive at Kennedy between 3pm-5pm Eastern (2000z-2200z). We look forward to seeing you in the Big Apple!

data.name: EDDW - EDDV Christmas Fly In
data.short_description: Come and celebrate Christmas with VATSIM Germany! Pay us a visit at Bremen or Hanover on December 17th between 17z - 21z. We keep the fields warm and have some mulled wine ready at the gates. Merry Christmas!
data.description:
VATSIM Germany invites everyone to fly into Bremen and Hanover. 17th December 2023 (1700z-2100z) - save the date! The smell of mulled wine, roasted almonds and freshly baked cookies is in the air. A motivated crew is waiting for you in Bremen & Hanover to nibble together. Join us drinking some mulled wine and enjoy the evening with us!

VATSIM Germany wishes everyone merry Christmas and in case we won't hear on frequency again this year: Happy new year 2024! 🙂

(Images: [Vectorportal.com](https://www.vectorportal.com/), [CC BY](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/) and [chestnutscoop + BeammanP, deviantart.com](https://www.deviantart.com/chestnutscoop/art/MMD-MME-KiraKira-snowV2-Effect-Download-849352158), [CC BY-NC](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/))

data.name: Stuttgart Sunday
data.short_description: Prepare for Stuttgart Sunday! No matter whether you are flying a small plane or a jet, IFR or VFR, if it flies it is welcome here.
data.description:
**Prepare for Stuttgart Sunday!** No matter whether you are flying a small plane or a jet, IFR or VFR, if it flies it is welcome here. From 20:00lcl to 22:00lcl (18:00z to 20:00z in the summer and **19:00z to 21:00z in the winter**) there will be a mix of old stagers and new trainees controlling for you. Fly from Stuttgart over the Swabian Jura, to Lake Constance or follow the Neckar to the Rhine. As destination for your IFR-Flights we would recommend Hanover, where RG Bremen is performing Hanover Onlineday and you can almost be sure of full ATC coverage.

**Charts:** [chartfox.org/EDDS](https://chartfox.org/EDDS) **Pilot Briefing:** [vats.im/edds](https://vats.im/edds)

data.name: [EKDK_CTR] | C1 Exam
data.short_description: Come and fly in Denmark to help Jeppe Seier prove his worthiness of the C1 rating on his checkout the 17th, 19-21Z.
data.description:
Come and fly in Denmark to help Jeppe Seier prove his worthiness of the C1 rating. Whether you take out a small propeller aircraft or a bigger jet aircraft the traffic is as always more than welcome, either IFR or VFR.

Charts can be found at: https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/pilots/airports-charts/denmark/

data.name: Hannover Sunday
data.short_description: Our Hanover online day will take place every Sunday from 2000-2200 local time. Be a part of it! :) We are looking forward to you!
data.description:
Dear pilots,

Our Hanover online day will take place this Sunday from 2000-2200 local time. 3 runways, exciting approaches, VFR routings to the coast or the Harz mountains, plus IFR destinations all over the world, what more could a pilot ask for? As always, our controller team is fully motivated and cant wait to guide you through the virtual airspace.

Be a part of it! :) We are looking forward to you!

data.name: 12 Days of Adria - Day 5 | BKPR
data.short_description: VATAdria presents to you: 12 Days of Adria - Day 5 | Pristina
data.description:
The festive season is here and for the past few months the events team have been planning on how we can make this Christmas a special one for Adria. The result is the most exciting event series Adria has seen to date: 12 Days of Adria. This Christmas, for the 11 days from the 14th leading up to the 25th of December, Adria will open a different airport each day, culminating in our longest event of the series, with an airport that you don't want to miss which will be open for at least 6 hours on Christmas Day, giving you plenty of options to fly if you're stumped with what to do if you don't celebrate Christmas on the 25th, or if your celebrations are over and perhaps you have some new peripherals to try!

On day 5 we will be opening....

Pristina (BKPR)

We will be opening Pristina from the hours of 17z-20z on the 18th of December. We hope that you will be able to join us at some point between the 14th and 25th of December to help make this event series, the biggest Adria has ever seen! We hope to see you there!

data.name: Turn Around Budapest
data.short_description: We kindly invite every pilot to Turn around Budapest on Mondays - a weekly event featuring Full ATC coverage over the Hungarian airspace.
data.description:
Turn Around Budapest

From 18z until 21z you can expect full coverage in the Hungarian airspace, including LHBP - Budapest, LHDC - Debrecen and LHSM - Sármellék/Hévíz-Balaton.
Grab a cup of tea or some snacks and plan for a great evening in the Budapest FIR.

[Briefing](http://vacchun.hu/en/repuloterek/)
[Charts](http://vacchun.hu/en/terkepek-es-scenery/)

data.name: Vienna Trainee-Night
data.short_description: We invite you to join our "Trainee-Night" on every second Monday! During this time, we will be staffing our Training-Airport Vienna (LOWW) and make sure to have as many of our Trainees as possible on our frequencies!
data.description:
Dear pilots!
We invite you to join our "Trainee-Night" every second Monday! During this time we will be staffing our Training-Airport Vienna (LOWW) and make sure to have as many of our Trainees as possible on our frequencies! Take the chance to support us in training our controllers by visiting one of the airports, no matter if you fly VFR or IFR and enjoy the additional opportunity to visit Vienna during full staffing! Our trainees will be glad to be provided with a lot of traffic to get their controlling to the next level!
We are looking forward to welcoming you!
Charts and Briefing: [Charts](https://www.vacc-austria.org/?page=content/chartlist&icao=LOWW) | [Briefing](https://downloads.vacc-austria.org/Documents/Briefings/2019_VIE_Briefing_V1.3.pdf)
See you in the skies!

data.name: Vectors to Copenhagen
data.short_description: Come get Vectors to final in Copenhagen! We are ready once again Monday already from 18z with full staffing. Come join!
data.description:
VATSIM-Scandinavia and Copenhagen FIR would like to invite you to our expanded weekly event **Vectors to Copenhagen.** Three hours full staffing from 18z-21z the team of VATSIM-Scandinavia controllers will be ready to get you into the beautiful capital of Denmark. 

Start you flight early to land for a Turnaround in Copenhagen with plenty of time to get back, or do it the other way around. Three hours is plenty of time to visit many beautiful sites around Europe and back. Be be aware! The later you come the more severe the traffic will be! 

Check your charts, get your airplane out the hangar and we will see you there! 

[Briefings, Charts and everything you need to know is here!](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/pilots/airports-charts/airport/ekch/)

[Check the ATC bookings here](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org)

data.name: VACC-Austria Weekly Wednesday
data.short_description: Weekly Wednesday - every Wednesday - 1830-2130z - FULL ATC in Austria
data.description:
Enjoy extended coverage of FULL ATC across the entire country. Take your favourite aircraft out of the hanger for a spin to our majors Vienna (LOWW) and/or the infamous Innsbruck Airport (LOWI). Alternatively enjoy a flight to our breath-taking minors: Salzburg (LOWS), Graz (LOWG), Klagenfurt (LOWK) or Linz (LOWL). Of course, we are providing full CPDLC and PDC service along the way!

Take a break from your busy schedule and enjoy an evening with 3 hours of guaranteed ATC-service "as real as it gets"! We are very excited to welcome you to one of our airports!

data.name: Roma nights
data.short_description: Dear pilots, VATITA is welcoming you all to fly in the Rome FIR, where we'll offer just the best of services, from the top to the bottom, also covering the airports of Fiumicino (LIRF) and Ciampino (LIRA).
data.description:
Dear pilots, **VATITA is welcoming you all** to fly in the Rome FIR, where we'll offer **just the best of services,** from the top to the bottom, covering the airports of Fiumicino (**LIRF**) and Ciampino (**LIRA**).

Pick your favorite plane, and fly in and out of our beautiful country, maybe connecting with our dear neighbors!
Theres something for everyone, so contact Roma on 124.200!

[LIRF Pilot Briefing, sceneries and charts](https://www.vats.im/it/LIRFBrief)

data.name: Welcome to HEL
data.short_description: VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki Airport will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.
data.description:
VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.

A rapidly growing team of controllers is looking forward to guiding you into Helsinki Airport (EFHK). Helsinki Control (EFIN_CTR) will also provide top-down service all across Finnish airspace. We guarantee professional, flexible and friendly service across the entirety of Finland.

See you on Thursday!

data.name: VFR XMAS
data.short_description: Come fly VFR between Biella Torino and Aosta, celebrate with us Christmas!
data.description:
Come fly **VFR** between Biella Torino and Aosta, celebrate with us Christmas!
Those airports are three little gems of northern Italy, you'll have the chance to fly a complex traffic pattern (at **LIMA**), enjoy the beautiful alps (at **LIMW**) and discover the home airport of our **vATO** where it all began (**LILE**).
Still want to fly IFR? Torino **LIMF** has you covered with some new fancy rnav arrival procedures!

Not sure how to navigate VFR in italian airspace? Check this briefing from a previous event:
[VFR event briefing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/19c9AGncwuzWqWKRCxTWqVuC4gnm0gD1i/view?usp=drive_link)

data.name: New year in Milano
data.short_description: From all of us at Vatita, a happy holidays and a joyful new year! You are officially invited to our New Year in Milano! Hang out with us, fly in, fly out, fly through, it doesn't really matter to us, as long as you're there to celebrate with us!
data.description:
Dear pilots,
from all of us at Vatita, a happy holidays and a joyful new year! Hopefully we'll have a nicer quieter and beautifuller 2024, but in the meantime, to celebrate this year's accomplishments and to thank you for your involvement in our community's growth, you are officially invited to our New Year in Milano!
Wednesday December the 28th, from 20.00z to 22.00z, hang out with us, fly in, fly out, fly through, it doesn't really matter to us, as long as you're there to celebrate with us!
We'll offer you only the best controlling and a nice way to escape family dinners when you don't want to talk with your third-degree aunt who only tries to pinch your cheeks since you were born.


[LIMC pilot briefing, charts and sceneries](https://vats.im/it/LIMCBrief)

data.short_description: VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki Airport will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.
data.description:
VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.

A rapidly growing team of controllers is looking forward to guiding you into Helsinki Airport (EFHK). Helsinki Control (EFIN_CTR) will also provide top-down service all across Finnish airspace. We guarantee professional, flexible and friendly service across the entirety of Finland.

See you on Thursday!

[Briefing](https://vatsim-scandinavia.org/pilots/airports-charts/airport/efhk/) and [Charts](https://www.ais.fi/aip/ad/efhk/efhk.htm)

data.name: Vienna Trainee-Night
data.short_description: We invite you to join our "Trainee-Night" on every second Monday! During this time, we will be staffing our Training-Airport Vienna (LOWW) and make sure to have as many of our Trainees as possible on our frequencies!
data.description:
Dear pilots!
We invite you to join our "Trainee-Night" every second Monday! During this time we will be staffing our Training-Airport Vienna (LOWW) and make sure to have as many of our Trainees as possible on our frequencies! Take the chance to support us in training our controllers by visiting one of the airports, no matter if you fly VFR or IFR and enjoy the additional opportunity to visit Vienna during full staffing! Our trainees will be glad to be provided with a lot of traffic to get their controlling to the next level!
We are looking forward to welcoming you!
Charts and Briefing: [Charts](https://www.vacc-austria.org/?page=content/chartlist&icao=LOWW) | [Briefing](https://downloads.vacc-austria.org/Documents/Briefings/2019_VIE_Briefing_V1.3.pdf)
See you in the skies!
